TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pulan, title = Pulan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pulan} }

S.FORM: pulan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko pulan a niyaro', 147 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 521 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 496 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq80%, Tayal10%, Bunun3%, Truku1%.

polan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko polan a niyaro', 147 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 521 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 496 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq80%, Tayal10%, Bonon3%, Troko1%.
